data.text:
@Rob_HD_DE Hello Robert,
once again, please accept our sincere apologies for the waiting.
We have replied to your private message.
Thank you.

@MattWilliamXIII For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message.
Thank you. (2/2)

@marcrech @marcrech Olá Marcelo, lamentamos profundamente os transtornos causados. Respondemos por mensagem direta. 
Obrigado.

@natyscaminha Olá Naty,

como podemos ajudar? Poderia clarificar, através de mensagem privada, a sua situação, paa que possamos verificar, por favor? Obrigado.

@YoussefChabi13 Hello Youssef,
we replied by private message. Thank you.

@NourDamien Bonsoir, 
afin de vérifier, nous vous prions de bien nous indiquer le code de réservation et le numéro de billet électronique. Par des raisons confidentielles, nous vous suggérons de nous envoyer les détails par message privé. Merci.
@Imran_galaria Hello Imran, we have answered your private messages. Thank you.
@BigWheels121 For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you. (2/2)
@victorsarro Olá victor, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.
@Guiselle_xO For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you. (2/2)
@nwahnon @DiogoNoivo Obrigado, Nuno.

@matteo_broggi @AeroportoLisboa Hello Matteo,

We sincerely apologize for the situation mentioned and the inconvenience caused. TAP Air Portugal works everyday in order to promote our passenger satisfaction and to improve our services. In case you require our assistance, please let us know. Thank you.
@nwahnon @DiogoNoivo Por razões de confidencialidade, sugerimos que nos indique os dados por mensagem privada. (2/2)

urls.title: Caracas
urls.description: The “City of Eternal Spring” is known for permanently offering great weather conditions. It was built 900 meters above sea level.

data.text:
@evansonalex Hello Alex,

can you inform us through DM your complaint file number and email address related so we may verify? Thank you.
@HenriquesLab Hello Ricardo, can you please provide us the booking reference? For security reasons, we suggest you do so by private message. Thank you.

@LeaTintaud @tapportugalair @TapportugalR Hello Lea,
we are truly sorry that the experience did not meet your expectations. If you still need assistance, please provide us the booking reference and the e-ticket number. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.
@marcossviaja Olá Marcos, pode indicar-nos o código de reserva, por favor? Por questões de segurança, sugerimos que nos envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@cookiesrsweet @tapportugalair Hello.

We sincerely apologize for the situation mentioned and the inconvenience caused. TAP Air Portugal works everyday in order to promote our passenger satisfaction and to improve our services. In case you require our assistance, please let us know. Thank you.
@DimaBerkut Olá Berkut, respondemos às suas mensagens diretas. Obrigado.
@DimaBerkut Olá Berkut, respondemos às suas mensagens diretas. Obrigado.

@J8me5r Hello James,

can you inform us through DM your complaint file number and email address related so we may verify? Thank you.

@PaulinhoBERABA Olá Paulo,

como podemos ajudar? Poderia clarificar, por mensagem privada, a sua situação, para que possamos verificar, por favor? Obrigado.

@hart_rory Hello Rory,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.
@carmemfrota13 Olá Carmem, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@Rodrig0Salgado @rodrig0salgado Hello Rodrigo, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. If we can still assist you through this channel, please provide us with your booking code by direct message. 
Thank you.

@upthevale @upthevale Hello Mark, we sincerely apologize for this situation and for the inconvenience. If we can assist with some question through this channel, we kindly ask you to provide us with your booking code by direct message. 
Thank you.

@Sue_Clark1 @sue_clark1 Hello Sue, we sincerely apologize for the situation and that our service did not meet your expectations. If we can help with any questions through this channel, please provide us with your booking code by direct message. Thank you.

data.text: @MarinovichVane Hola VaneMarinovich, hemos contestado a su tweet anterior. Gracias.
@MarinovichVane Hola VaneMarinovich, hemos contestado a través de Instagram. Gracias.

@ANGIEPOPS11 @angiepops11 Hello Angelique, we regret that our service did not meet your expectations. We hope you can have a more positive experience in the future. If we can help with any question through this channel, please provide us with the booking code by direct message. Thank you.
@peter83400 Hello Bertrand, we apologize for the delay and inform you that we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@SirDukelawson @sirdukelawson Hello Luke, we answered by direct message. Thank you.

@hannahmc38 @hannahmc38 Hello Hannah, we regret that our service did not meet your expectations. We hope you can have a more positive experience in the future. If we can assist with any questions through this channel, please inform us. 
Thank you.

@DrTimSteiner @drtimsteiner Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience. If you still need assistance regarding this situation, we kindly ask you to provide us with your booking code. 
For confidential reasons we suggest that you send it by direct message. Thank you.
@saninemoreira We have replied via DM, Sanine. Thank you.

@khai_ton1 Hello Khai, we apologize for the delay on our reply.
In order to verify, we kindly ask you to send us your lost luggage file and booking reference by private message. Thank you.

@renatomefi Hello /dev/mefi/renato, we apologize for the delay on our reply which is due to a higher number of requests currently received.
If assistance is still needed, in order to verify, we kindly ask you to send us your booking reference or e-ticket number by private message. Thank you.
@Mkaj14411 Hello Mkaj1441, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@WilbaCastello @wilbacastello Wilba, respondemos por mensagem direta. Obrigada.

@chakradhar01 @staralliance @EUAirclaims Hello Chakra, we apologize for the delay on our reply and inconvenience caused.
If assistance is still needed, please send us your booking reference or e-ticket number by private message. Thank you.

@LeticiaKijf @leticiakijf Olá Letícia, respondemos por mensagem direta. 
Obrigada.

@bcstagg @bcstagg Hello Barry, we regret that our service did not meet your expectations. We hope you can have a more positive experience in the future. If we can help with some question,please let us know. 
Thank you.

urls.title: Contact form - Send requests, suggestions or complaints | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Speak with TAP, complete the contact form and share your view of our service. Submit your information requests, praise, suggestions or complaints.

data.text: @ZeDoutore Olá ZD,  pedimos que nos indique o código de reserva e/ou o número do bilhete eletrónico, por mensagem direta, por questões de confidencialidade, para podermos verificar, caso ainda necessite da nossa assistência. Agradecemos desde já a informação.
@thomas_vincent1 Bonjour Thomas, nous nous excusons pour ce délai et vous informons que nous avons répondu a votre message privé. Merci.

@marcossviaja Marcos, devido ao elevado número de contactos o tempo de resposta é superior ao desejável, para todos os nossos passageiros. As suas mensagens serão respondidas assim que possível, pelo que pedimos que aguarde um pouco mais e agradecemos a sua compreensão.
@WilbaCastello @wilbacastello Olá Wilba, respondemos por mensagem direta. Obrigada.

@SCMontiel @scmontiel Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience. Can you provide us with the booking code? For confidential reasons we suggest to send it by direct message. 
Thank you.

@brunospfc03 @brunospfc03 Olá Bruno, lamentamos que o nosso serviço não tenha ido ao encontro das suas expectativas. Caso possamos ajudar com alguma questão por esta via, sugerimos o envio dos dados por mensagem privada.
Obrigado.
@florian_geri However, we regret that our services did not meet your expectations and remain at your disposal. Thank you. (2/2)

@florian_geri Hello Florian, we apologize for the inconvenience caused.
We inform you air transport operation is conditioned by several factors, many of which are not controlled by the airlines, such as weather conditions, airport or air traffic congestion, among others. (1/2) https://t.co/NpoA0GRgug
@britiburcio @britiburcio Hello Bridget we replied by direct message. Thank you.

@mudonthedoor Hello mudonthedoor@mudonthedoor, we apologize or the delay on our reply and distress caused.
If assistance is still needed, please let us know your booking reference or e-ticket number by private message. Thank you.

@kcidani Sometimes, due to the proximity of the flight time, it is not possible for us to make this communication.  If assistance is needed, please contact us through private message with the booking reference or e-ticket number. Thank you. (2/2)

@kcidani Hello Ian, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. 
We try to notify our passengers as far in advance as possible in case of operational irregularities, which we try to avoid until the last moment. (1/2)

@MeloCarecchio Bonjour Mélodie, nous regrettons la gêne occasionnée et que nos services n'aient pas répondu aux attentes.
Si vous avez toujours besoin d'assistance, veuillez nous contacter par message privé avec les détails de votre réservation et numéro de dossier de perte de bagage. Merci.
@Mia_Canada01 @Mia_Canada01 Hello, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.

@NeatherH @neatherh Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience. Can you provide us with your booking code? For security reasons, we suggest sending it by direct message. 
Thank you.
@george_lines @george_lines Hello George, we replied to your private message. Thank you.

@marcossviaja Olá Marcos,
As suas mensagens serão respondidas o mais brevemente possível. Agradecemos a compreensão.
@TheTravellerXXI Hi! To better assist you, please DM us your complaint number and the email address linked to it. Thank you in advance.

@jesssuttner Hi! Although we understand your considerations, the fee applied is correct since your wife's carry-on does not comply with the permitted weight. This is regular procedure. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

@carlitosbrutal Hola! Lamentamos la situación reportada. Si todavia es necesaria nuestra ayuda, por favor envíe un mensaje directo con el código de reserva o el número del billete electrónico. Gracias.
@suifcx Olá! Lamentamos antes de mais todos os inconvenientes causados pelo cancelamento do seu voo. Informamos que respondemos através de mensagem direta. Obrigada.

@Mtven_ta_ni_lla Hola MTVentanilla,
Lamentamos la demora en la tramitación de sus reclamaciones. Tan pronto como se complete el análisis se le contactará por correo electrónico. Le rogamos que espere por favor. Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier duda o aclaración adicional. Gracias.

@MaulysRivero Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. For compensation purposes, we inform that you will need to submit the following link available on our website - https://t.co/bwFSKNdpJ7. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@sophiarenard854 Hello Sophia,

We understand your situation. You may fill a complaint form through the link https://t.co/3nTBK3gGcK . After the form filled, we kindly ask you to wait for our Customer Service's feedback, in order to verify your case. Thank you.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Food & Beverage Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent and related to foods & beverages such as snacks, soft drinks, beers.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.name: Product Taxonomy
domain.description: A product taxonomy for labeling categories of products.

data.text:
White, Red, Porto… Which will be your choice for this flight? 🍷
Our new Wine List available on board has exclusively Portuguese options for the most diverse palates. Come and enjoy them above the clouds! Get to know more at: https://t.co/tmQOwIJi50. https://t.co/mb0L0p0Red

urls.title: Wine Experience
urls.description: TAP offers the world the best of Portuguese winemaking.

data.text: @BlancaPlanet Hola! Lamentamos la situación. Su reclamación sigue en análisis. Se pondrán nuevamente en contacto con usted por correo electrónico tan pronto como sea posible. Le rogamos que espere por favor. Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier duda o aclaración adicional. Gracias.

@BlancaPlanet @BezerraKelsei Hi! We deeply regret the situation. Your complaint is still under review. You will receive new feedback anytime soon. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you require any further help. Thank you in advance.
@___Sasha___ Hi! We deeply regret the situation. If our assistance is still needed, please DM us your booking details. Thank you in advance.
@SandraSamfly Bonsoir! Nous sommes désolés pour toute cette situation. Une réponse vous a été apportée en message direct. Merci d'avance.
@Luithi16 De nada, Luithi. Obrigado pelo seu contacto.

@DianeTorrance3 Hello Diane,

how may we assist you? Can you clarify your situation by DM so we may verify? Thank you.
@c_taija Hello Taija, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@saninemoreira Hello Sanine, we are sorry to read that your experience did not meet your expectations. If you would like further clarification, please send us a direct message with your claim details, for confidentiality reasons. We thank you in advance.

@bfg9090 Hello bfg90, we have verified that your complaint is under analysis, so you will be contacted by email as soon as possible. If you have any other questions we can help you with, feel free to contact us. Thank you.
@Blink_Insomnia0 Bonjour Once-insomnia, il est valable tant que le bagage à main respecte les limites autorisées (en nombre, taille et poids) - https://t.co/jQWEkCQvQY . Merci.

urls.title: Bagage à main autorisé dans l'avion
urls.description: Sachez tout sur les bagages à main à bord des avions TAP : leur poids et leurs dimensions et ce que vous pouvez prendre avec vous en cabine.

data.text: @cout_ke_cout Nous réitérons l'information transmise précédemment. Votre dossier est actuellement en cours de traitement. Nous vous contacterons à nouveau aussitôt que nous aurons des détails supplémentaires sur la situation. Merci de bien vouloir attendre.
@RoystonRedmond Hi! We have replied to your DM. Our apologies for the delay. Thank you.

@f2rpin Hello Franck,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.
@AlexG52655115 Hello AlexG, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@cout_ke_cout Nous vous prions de bien vouloir patienter et restons à votre disposition pour toute aide complémentaire. Merci.
@cout_ke_cout Bonsoir! Nous sommes désolés du délai de traitement de votre dossier. Votre situation est en cours de vérification. Nous reprendrons contact aussitôt que nous ayons des nouvelles.

@lilloumm You may fill a complaint form through the link https://t.co/3nTBK3gGcK . After the form filled, we kindly ask you to wait for our Customer Service's feedback, in order to verify your case. Thank you.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @NickLinford Nick, as your ticket was bought through an online agency, the refund must be requested directly to the agency. If you have any other questions we can help you with, feel free to contact us. Thank you.
@GermanRob4 Due to the high number of cases, the current time needed for analysis can be longer than usual. You will be contacted, via email, as soon as possible. We remain available.(2/2)

@GermanRob4 Hello GermanRob, we would like to inform that every complaint is carefully analyzed, and its analysis may take more or less time, depending on the complexity of the situation and the necessity to verify with other services.(1/2)
@NickLinford Nick, we have sent the electronic tickets by email. Also, the check-in was automatically made by the system. Can we help you with any other questions?

@lilloumm Hello Lillou,

according to the information we have the flight is estimated to leave at 07:35 from Paris (Orly) to Lisbon. Thank you.
@NickLinford Nick, do you wish to keep this protection or shall we change the flight to another date?
